ygData.subject: RE: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I  have learned a few survival techniques last night while in the hand room in Unrest.  My party consisted of a rogue, myself a ranger and three wizzies.
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have learned a few survival techniques last night while in the
hand room in Unrest. My party consisted of a rogue, myself a ranger and
three wizzies. That's right no healer whatsoever. Let's see some of the
lessons that I learned:

1. I cannot tank unless they are blue and totally asleep.
2. Green ghouls hit harder and more often than me (Got ambushed by a 5
ghoul train)
3. Yes healing song is great. Gives you reason not to fight and get hit.
4. The random number generator is horrible. I am wearing almost a full
suit of plate and was encumbered, yet I was able to get this message 4
times in a row "A skeletal monk hits you, but you dodge"
5. Extra mobs love singers

And finally

6. Don't ever level when camping in a room or the Festering hag will come
by to congratulate you =).

That happened to me last night as soon as I got my ding for my level I
look up and see my health bar drop from 5 bubbles to two bubbles in a
matter of seconds. What appeared? A festering hag coming to congratualte
me on my level 25. Was I singing a song? NOpe I was actually doing
nothing at the time =).

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana

On Fri, 3 Sep 1999, James Schuldes wrote:

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> here are a few tips passed along to me (usually when the party sees my hp
> slip under 2 bubs)
>
> "you are about as much of a tank as t.a.f.k.a.Prince is a bouncer"
> "you have to learn to stop hitting them and let them beat on the others"
> "you have to learn to scrape them onto the real tanks"
> "you have to learn to step out of the melee...it's called 'creative
> chickenology'"
> "GET OUT!!!"
>
> and then there is the famous....
>
> "SYLLY WEP!!!"
>
> which was preceeded by...
>
> "you try to punch a aviak harrier but miss..."
>
> Sylly.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Abraham Hardjana
> [mailto:ahardjan@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 03, 1999 10:50 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Superstitions?
>
> From: Abraham Hardjana
> <ahardjan@...>
>
> I would be the first to humbly agree that dying is greatest
> reason why I
> cannot level. Even with Verants change to reduce the amount
> of xp you
> lose when you die, I still lost 1/3 of a bubble dying to a
> stupid
> basement train last night. At least I got my level, though
> it took at
> least another to earn it back =(. Perhaps it is time to be
> less noble
> and more parts chicken. It seems that I die more often when
> trying to
> care people, perhaps it would be better to be known as
> Treilanin the you
> yellow bellied chicken .... Nah I think not =).
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver
> Honour Guard, Karana
>
>
